pr_title: Fix support of peers that do not support eth/65

timeline.message:
Fix support of peers <eth/65

Signed-off-by: Antoine Toulme <antoine@lunar-ocean.com>

Fix unit test

Signed-off-by: Antoine Toulme <antoine@lunar-ocean.com>

timeline.bodyText: The protocol should be an argument, for future feature support.  I don't think this will be the first time we will change behavior based on ETH subprotocol support.
timeline.author: shemnon
shemnon

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    .filter(transactionTracker::isPeerSupported)
          
          
            
                    .filter(peer -> transactionTracker.isPeerSupported(peer, EthProtocol.ETH65)
          
      
    
    
  

May require an import, and similarly to the other 5 places it's called.
